remarks: Alternate definition of IV-finite sets: they are strictly dominated by their successors.  (Thus, the proper subset referred to in ~ isfin4 can be assumed to be only a singleton smaller than the original.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2015.)
statement: isfin4-3 $p |- ( A e. Fin4 <-> A ~< ( A +c 1o ) ) $.
